jab.translation[0].definitions[0].defini: to push something into or towards something else with short quick movements
jab.translation[0].definitions[0].exampl: When I didn’t respond, he jabbed a finger at me.
She jabbed at the elevator buttons.
Stop jabbing me with your elbow!
The soldier jabbed a rifle into his ribs.
jab.translation[1].definitions[0].defini: a sudden hard hit, especially with a pointed object or your fist (=closed hand)
jab.translation[1].definitions[0].exampl: a boxer with a good left jab
jab.translation[1].definitions[1].defini: something you say to criticize someone or something else
jab.translation[1].definitions[1].exampl: White House officials took a sharp jab at the Democrats’ plan.
jab.translation[1].definitions[2].defini: an injection given to prevent you from catching a disease
